Mr* Burton Paulu
Radio 'Station KUOM
University of Minnesota
Minneapolis, Minnesota
D^ar Burtons t
I am afraid I owe you several letters now but here is
a quicky which I thought you might use for straight news.
At the annual spring meeting of the Alabama Broadcasters
Association in Huntsville, Alabama on March 10 and 11, the
University of Alabama* s III station, YTJQA, was voted member¬
ship in the ABA and I was elected Secretary-Treasurer of that
organization.
I am still hoping to find time from bouncing around over
the state to clear ay desk of long past letters, questionnaires,
etc. and I have a feeling that there are two or three communi¬
cations from you which require attention.
May I congratulate you upon the last edition of the
Newsletter. It was very well done.
Ify good wishes to you always.
Sincerely,
Graydon Ausmus, Director
Radio Broadcasting Services
Manager, WUOA^FM
GA/ ns
